verses.verse: Send <S%H7971><s%> ye the <S%H3733>lambs<s%> for the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H5554>Selah<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, unto the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

For it shall be <S%H5074>that<s%>, as wandering <S%H5775>birds<s%>, as a <S%H7971>scattered<s%> <S%H7064>nest<s%>, so shall the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> be at the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>.

Give <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H6415>justice<s%>; <S%H7896>make<s%> thy <S%H6738>shade<s%> as the <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6672>noonday<s%>; <S%H5641>hide<s%> the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%>; betray not the <S%H5074>fugitive<s%>.

Let mine <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with <S%H4124>thee<s%>; as for Moab, <S%H1933>be<s%> thou a <S%H5643>covert<s%> to him from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%>. For the <S%H4160>extortioner<s%> is brought to <S%H656>nought<s%>, <S%H7701>destruction<s%> <S%H3615>ceaseth<s%>, the <S%H7429>oppressors<s%> are <S%H8552>consumed<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And a <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>; and one shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> thereon in <S%H571>truth<s%>, in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H8199>judging<s%>, and <S%H1875>seeking<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>, and <S%H4106>swift<s%> to do <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>.

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, that he is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1341>proud<s%>; even of his <S%H1346>arrogancy<s%>, and his <S%H1347>pride<s%>, and his <S%H5678>wrath<s%>; his boastings are <S%H907>nought<s%>.

Therefore shall <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3213>wail<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, every one shall <S%H3213>wail<s%>: for the <S%H808>raisin-cakes<s%> of <S%H7025>Kir-hareseth<s%> shall ye <S%H1897>mourn<s%>, utterly <S%H5218>stricken<s%>.

For the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H535>languish<s%>, and the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%>; the <S%H1167>lords<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have broken <S%H1986>down<s%> the choice <S%H8291>branches<s%> <S%H5060>thereof<s%>, which reached even unto <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>, which <S%H8582>wandered<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; its <S%H7976>shoots<s%> were spread <S%H5203>abroad<s%>, they passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

Therefore I will <S%H1058>weep<s%> with the <S%H1065>weeping<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> for the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%>; I will <S%H7301>water<s%> thee with my <S%H1832>tears<s%>, O <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H500>Elealeh<s%>: for upon thy summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%> and upon thy <S%H7105>harvest<s%> the battle <S%H1959>shout<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>.

And <S%H8057>gladness<s%> is taken <S%H622>away<s%>, and <S%H1524>joy<s%> out of the fruitful <S%H3759>field<s%>; and in the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> there shall be no <S%H7442>singing<s%>, neither joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%>: no <S%H1869>treader<s%> shall tread <S%H1869>out<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in the <S%H3342>presses<s%>; I have made the vintage <S%H1959>shout<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>.
Wherefore my <S%H4578>heart<s%> <S%H1993>soundeth<s%> like a <S%H3658>harp<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and mine inward <S%H7130>parts<s%> for <S%H7025>Kir-heres<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H4124>pass<s%>, when Moab <S%H7200>presenteth<s%> <S%H3811>himself<s%>, when he wearieth himself upon the high <S%H1116>place<s%>, and shall <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%>, that he shall not <S%H3201>prevail<s%>.
This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> concerning <S%H4124>Moab<s%> in time <S%H227>past<s%>.

But now <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, as the <S%H8141>years<s%> of a <S%H7916>hireling<s%>, the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be brought into <S%H7034>contempt<s%>, with all his <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%>; and the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> shall be <S%H4592>very<s%> <S%H4213>small<s%> and of no <S%H3808>account<s%>.
